entry.title: Libre/Open blockchain / cryptographic ASICs
entry.summary: Luke Kenneth Casson Leighton, a member of the bitcoin-dev community, posed an open question asking what people would like to see happen in regards to bridging the gap and delivering to the wider bitcoin user community. Pavol "stick" Rusnak, CTO of SatoshiLabs, expressed excitement about Luke's efforts and mentioned that their company had spun off a new entity called Tropic Square which shares the goal of bringing open security chips to the general public. He offered to arrange a call to exchange ideas with Luke. The link to Tropic Square's website is provided in the email.
